Class CellPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.CellPosition

  • public class CellPosition
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    João Mendes class represents a position in the map

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CellPosition()
      creates a new position at x = 1, y = 1
      CellPosition(CellPosition pos)
      creates a "copy" from another cell position

      creates a new position in specified coordinates
